AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Judge Kazen: judge presiding over Alfredo Ortega-Chavez's trial, maintained impartiality and conducted proceedings fairly and competently
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. Government Attorney: prosecutor in the case against Alfredo Ortega-Chavez, responsible for disclosing witness information
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court presiding over Alfredo Ortega-Chavez's trial, responsible for enforcing disclosure rules
